title: Diamond support main looking for ADC/TEAM

embed.description: A sweet lie / Platinum 1 83LP / 239W 203L Win Ratio 54% / Riven - 219W 149L Win Ratio 60%, Braum - 44W 44L Win Ratio 50%, Jayce - 43W 32L Win Ratio 57%, Hecarim - 22W 25L Win Ratio 47%, Master Yi - 11W 16L Win Ratio 41%

body:
**About me:**
I was able to get to Diamond IV through spamming Riven and Braum. 
I have stopped playing the game for around 4 months because I just stopped enjoying the game. So, I **decayed** to Plat I.
However, now I'm really into it again, and am planning to become high Diamond/Master next season by playing support.

**Supports I have mastered:**
{{champion:201}} 

**Supports I'm decent at:**
{{champion:223}} {{champion:12}} 

**Supports I'm planning to play and improve on:**
{{champion:44}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} 

I will be trying hard next season. I can play Riven very well, so I will be putting **TOP as my secondary role**.
I usually play between 6AM-11AM & 7PM-12PM.

I do believe I can improve as a support massively. I believe that if I can get to diamond just _auto-piloting_ and playing only two champions, if I expanded my champion pool and tried harder, I could get into even a higher league.

**My Goal:**

- Get into at least a semi-pro team.
- Become challenger.
- Be a content maker.
